Description:
The role of Import/Export specialist involves being able to manage deadlines and sometimes difficult situations, therefore an element of negotiation is required in order to be able to meet timescales.Complete all shipping documents from the General Authority for Export Control
 Imports, Chamber of Commerce, Embassies, Customs, Shipping Companies, Shipping Lines and Banks.
 Working on contacting all shipping lines.
  Follow up on shipping work.
Follow up on finalizing all shipping documents until they are delivered to the competent banks.
 Carrying out other tasks assigned to him.
Follow up on clients identified by the Director of the Export Department.Skills
Skills: A very good command of English is a must

Data.Company Industry: FMCG; Food & Beverage Production; Sales Outsourcing
